JobFullDesc: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.Microsoft Consulting Services helps Microsoft customers around the world get the best outcomes from their investments in the latest Microsoft cloud technologies. We focus on empowering customers on their digital journey, from envisioning new possibilities to delivering solutions that result in targeted business outcomes and a great customer experience.The Microsoft Federal Azure Cloud and AI team is looking for a Cybersecurity Solution Architect to be responsible for delivering high quality architectural solutions and business outcomes based on the Microsoft Platform and to help guide customers securely through their digital transformation. The role requires both broad and deep technology expertise, advanced analysis skills and information security industry knowledge to define appropriate customer solutions, scope and estimate effort, and provide technical leadership in sales pursuits and solution delivery. The Impact You’ll Be MakingThe focus of the Solution Architect role is to Make the Market and drive Digital Transformation and Modernization Solutions with a deeper focus on mapping customer business and security problems to Microsoft Cybersecurity, Security and Identity solutions.You will engage over the entire lifecycle of large and complex projects from early pre-sales through delivery oversight to ensure architectural and technical success for our customers. You will lead and motivate technical communities and provide quality assurance for solutions developed by others. You will present to executive audiences, help customer account teams identify, pursue and close strategic business development opportunities, and drive add-on business within existing projects.The Solution Architect must have current and deep experience across the Microsoft suite of security technologies and solutions. Expert level knowledge and real-world experience in Enterprise Security in cloud, on premise and hybrid environments is required. This role also requires assisting customers in architecting, planning and applying governance for Microsoft Cybersecurity, Security and Identity Solutions as appropriate.
